targets.expr:
# not using last_over_time here because it's not too useful,
# and there are a lot of metrics (one for each collector) making the query quite slow
count by(location, instance) (node_scrape_collector_success{instance=~"$instance"})
or
count by(location, instance) (windows_exporter_collector_success{instance=~"$instance"})

count by(location, instance) (node_scrape_collector_success{instance=~"$instance"} == 0)
or
count by(location, instance) (windows_exporter_collector_success{instance=~"$instance"} == 0)

max by(location, instance) (
  (node_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance"} + time() - timestamp(node_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance"}))
  or
  last_over_time(node_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance"}[$__range])
) * 1000
or
max by(location, instance) (
  (windows_time_current_timestamp_seconds{instance=~"$instance"} + time() - timestamp(windows_time_current_timestamp_seconds{instance=~"$instance"}))
  or
  last_over_time(windows_time_current_timestamp_seconds{instance=~"$instance"}[$__range])
) * 1000

max by(location, instance) (
  (node_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance"} - timestamp(node_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance"}))
)
or
max by(location, instance) (
  (windows_time_current_timestamp_seconds{instance=~"$instance"} - timestamp(windows_time_current_timestamp_seconds{instance=~"$instance"}))
)

max by(location, instance) (last_over_time(node_boot_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance"}[$__range])) * 1000
or
max by(location, instance) (last_over_time(windows_system_boot_time_timestamp{instance=~"$instance"}[$__range])) * 1000

time() - max by(location, instance) (last_over_time(node_boot_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance"}[$__range]))
or
time() - max by(location, instance) (last_over_time(windows_system_boot_time_timestamp{instance=~"$instance"}[$__range]))

# this is a separate query to keep a consistent order or instances in match with "boot time" timeline
max by(location, instance) (min_over_time(up{job="windows-exporter", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval]))

max by(location, instance) (
  (node_time_seconds{instance=~"$instance"} - timestamp(node_time_seconds))
)
or
max by(location, instance) (
  (windows_time_current_timestamp_seconds{instance=~"$instance"} - timestamp(windows_time_current_timestamp_seconds))
)
sum by(location, instance) (avg_over_time(instance_mode:node_cpu_seconds:irate{instance=~"$instance", mode!~"idle|steal"}[$__interval]) / on(instance) group_left() node:cpu_cores)
sum by(location, instance) (avg_over_time(instance_mode:windows_cpu_time:irate{instance=~"$instance", mode!~"idle|steal"}[$__interval]) / on(instance) group_left() node:cpu_cores)

max by(location, instance) (
(
node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$instance"}
-
node_memory_MemFree_bytes
-
(
    node_memory_Cached_bytes
    +
    node_memory_Buffers_bytes
    +
    node_memory_SReclaimable_bytes
)
- (node_zfs_arc_size or node_memory_MemTotal_bytes * 0)
) / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes
)

max by(location, instance) (
(
node_memory_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance"}
-
node_memory_free_bytes
-
(
    node_memory_inactive_bytes
    +
    node_memory_cache_bytes
    +
    node_memory_buffer_bytes
)
) / node_memory_size_bytes
)

panels.title: Schedule timeslices executed by each cpu
